questions.quote: All names sound strange the first time you hear 'em. What, you telling me people loved the name Blanche the first time they heard it?
I dunno , I'm gonna ask Shelley ,but she still might be upset from the masticated pecan incident.
So, ever since she started dating Kramer, she won't even talk to me!
I have a uh...mental alarm. I set my head for... quarter to seven and...  ...I get up!
You know I think ultimately, I'm upset with myself. I knew what I was getting into, she's a bitter, unstable person. I mean the sex was good. I'm sure it was fine for her. I need more.
Yeah, yeah. You know what? There are a lot of players named Deon these days. What a cool name, Deon. If I were gonna change my name, I'd go with Deon.
You're pretending to live in a janitor's closet, just to get this flounder?
I don't want to be Murphy anymore; do I still have to be Murphy?
I don't wanna mix in everything! My guys don't know your guys. You can't just lock 'em all in the same machine together. They'll start a riot.
I can't eat this without catsup. Would it kill her to check up on us? Would that be a terrible thing? "How's everything? Do you need anything? What can I do for you?"
